message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique benefits, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $7,200 for you. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is worth significantly more, at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. I look forward to your positive response.
